mapper.select: select atNo,name from area where levelOrder=1 and pId=#{provinceId}
select atNo,name from area where levelOrder=2 and pId=#{cityId}
select atNo,name from area where levelOrder=0
select atNo,name,pId from structure where delFlag=0
select atNo,name,pId from role where delFlag=0
select atNo,code,pId,kindNm name from goodsKind where delFlag=0
select atNo,name from unitSet

select g.atNo,g.code,k.kindNm, case when g.alias='' then concat(g.brand,g.goodsNm) else concat(g.brand,g.goodsNm,'(',g.alias,')') end goodsNm from goods g left join goodsKind k on g.kindId=k.atNo where g.delFlag=0
limit ${page},${pageSize}
select count(*) from goods g where g.delFlag=0
select atNo,teamNm name from CustomTeam where headAtNo=#{customerId} and delFlag=0
select code from structure where atNo=#{structId} limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into ReviewProcess (billType,billId,nodeNm,operatorId,operatorNm, createTime,operNm,remark) values (#{billType},#{billId},#{nodeNm},#{operatorId},#{operatorNm}, now(),#{operNm},#{remark})
mapper.select: select userNm from user where atNo=#{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into purchaseListD (headAtNo,centerId,customerId,teamId,goodsId, orderNum,goodsNm,unitNm,spec,goodsType,remark,tempGoodsType,code) select ${purchaseListHId},${structId},t.customerId, d.teamId,d.goodsId,d.demandNum,d.goodsNm,d.unitNm,d.spec, d.goodsType,d.remark,d.tempGoodsType,d.code from teamdemand t LEFT JOIN demandlistd d on t.atNo=d.headAtNo where t.headAtNo=#{billId}
mapper.select: select name from unitSet where atNo=#{goodsUnit}
select teamNm from CustomTeam where atNo=#{teamId}
select atNo,customNm name from customer where structId=#{structId} and delFlag=0
select customNm from customer where atNo=#{customerId}
select tagId from customer where atNo=#{customerId}
SELECT tagID FROM customer WHERE atno = #{customerId}
mapper.insert: insert into ReturnProcess (billType,billId,nodeNm,operatorId,operatorNm, createTime,operNm,remark) values (#{billType},#{billId},#{nodeNm},#{operatorId},#{operatorNm}, now(),#{operNm},#{remark})
mapper.select: select c.goodsId,g.code goodsCode,concat(g.brand,g.goodsNm) goodsNm, g.spec,g.unitNm,t.tagGoodsPrice price from centerGoods c left join goods g on c.goodsId=g.atNo left join TagGoods t on c.goodsId=t.goodsId and t.tagId=#{tagId} where c.centerId=#{structId} and c.delFlag=0 order by g.code

SELECT c.goodsId,g.goodsNm,g.code,g.spec,g.unitNm,u.userNm,s.supplierId FROM centergoods c LEFT JOIN goods g ON g.atNo=c.goodsId LEFT JOIN suppliergoods s ON s.goodsId=c.goodsId LEFT JOIN USER u ON u.atNo=s.supplierId
select t.customerId from demandlisth h inner join teamDemand t on h.atNo=t.headAtNo where h.atNo=#{billId} limit 1

select c.goodsId,g.code goodsCode,g.goodsNm, g.spec,g.unitNm,s.frontPrice price, IFNULL(s.supplierId,-1) supplierId,IFNULL(u.userNm,'自采') supplierNm from centerGoods c left join goods g on c.goodsId=g.atNo left join SupplierGoods s on c.goodsId=s.goodsId and s.centerId=#{structId} and s.delFlag=0 left join user u on s.supplierId=u.atNo where c.centerId=#{structId} and c.delFlag=0 order by g.code
